text:
Your performance, Natsuha-san...
was refined down to the fingertips.

Chiyoko had a particularly precise appeal to the camera.
She didn't miss a moment, delivering her charm to the fullest.

Rinze-chan's expressiveness is strong! From delicate
expressions to powerful dances, she handled it all with ease!

(Was this a post-show discussion
about yesterday's music program...?)
I'm planning to watch today, looking forward to it.

If we could deliver the climax...
that would be great...

Hehe, yes! Your encouragement
before yesterday's performance really got to me.

Huh, ah...!?
I just wanted to point out everyone's good points...!?

We promise to deliver the best after-school time,
so please enjoy it to the fullest!
